laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Four months later, another lumbar puncture revealed very high ICP (29 mm Hg).

laboratory_examinations.findings: Normal ICP values after gastric bypass surgery. Initially recorded very high ICP over 15 mm Hg before surgery.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: ICP returned to normal physiological levels post-surgery.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Both ICP sensors recorded values within the reference range at every time point.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: No significant changes in registration correlated between ICP readings and the patient's headaches.
Resolution of the optic nerve edema after gastric bypass surgery.
